table.question: What aspects of your work give you the most satisfaction or sense of accomplishment?
What aspects of your job currently reduce your motivation or energy at work?
Describe a recent work experience where you felt highly motivated. What contributed to that feeling?
What personal or professional goals does your current role help you work toward?
Which factor most influences your motivation at work?
What kind of recognition or feedback makes you feel most motivated?
Which of the following, if improved, would most increase your motivation? (Select all that apply)
How supported do you feel by your manager or team, and why?
Do you feel your work is valued by the organization?
What changes could the organization make to better support your motivation and engagement?
If you could change one thing about your job to make it more motivating, what would it be and why?
